name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fruittful - View, Preview & Bookmark YouTube Thumbnails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fruittful is a free Chrome extension that lets you view full-size thumbnails of YouTube videos as you browse YouTube.

Just install the extension and press the "View Thumbnail" button that shows up below YouTube videos to view their full-size thumbnails.

Subscribe to Fruittful for premium features like Bookmarking and Previewing that lets you bookmark the thumbnails you find inspiring and preview your own thumbnails directly on YouTube home page.

Visit www.fruittful.com for more information.

If you have any questions or face any difficulties during the usage of the extension, please reach out to us at support@fruittful.com.
